notes.title: Authors' contributions
notes.p: YC contributed to patient care, immunohistochemistry, provision of study materials from patients, data analysis and interpretation, and manuscript writing. HS contributed to IVF, patient recruitment and follow-up. HZ contributed to patient recruitment and follow-up, patient care, provision of study materials, data analysis and interpretation, and manuscript writing. XZ contributed to hysteroscopic inspection and surgery, and uterine adhesion classification. XT contributed to hysteroscopic inspection and surgery, and uterine adhesion classification. DB contributed to isolation, passage and characterization of UC-MSCs. JW contributed to preparation of the UC-MSCs. LW contributed to biological safety and biological activity analysis of the clinical-grade UC-MSCs and coordinating the cell-related experiments. QZ contributed to conception and design of the experiment using clinical-grade UC-MSCs. HW contributed to hysteroscopic inspection and surgery, uterine adhesion classification. CD contributed to ultrasound monitoring, and ultrasound scan during follow-up. LD contributed to preparation of the UC-MSC/collagen complex. BX contributed to devising the statistical plan, collection and assembly of data, and statistical analysis. YZ contributed to data analysis and interpretation. JH contributed to quality control of UC-MSCs, and final approval of the manuscript. JD contributed to conception and design, provision of collagen scaffold, and final approval of the manuscript. YH contributed to principle investigator, design of clinical trial, surgeries, patient care, data analysis and interpretation, manuscript writing, and final approval of the manuscript. GY IVF, patient recruitment and follow-up. JW pathological inspection and diagnosis. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
